Standard Text Formatting:
- Headers: Use ## for sections, ### for subsections
- Body text: Standard GitHub markdown rendering (14-16px)
- Code blocks: Use ``` for code snippets
- Lists: Use - or * for bullet points
- Links: [text](url) format
- Emphasis: **bold** for important, *italic* for notes
- Text Intensity: High contrast for accessibility (4.5:1 minimum)
-->
